entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 7 JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme not work with Entity framework core Identity #47119
  • Receiving r.arrayBuffer is not a function with InputFile component on iOS 12.5.6 #47116
  • ASP.NET Core module installer should be improved further #47115
  • Cannot load PDBs for Microsoft.AspNetCore within .Net 7.0.3 #47113
  • [Blazor] Microsoft Edge translation causes crash because of DOM manipulation #47111
    .NET 8 Planning
  • NavigationLock silently throws JSDisconnected exception with OnBeforeInternalNavigation #47109
  • F# examples in docs #47108
  • [Authorize(AuthenticationSchemes = TheOnlyAuthScheme)] also runs default scheme AuthenticationHandler on success #47105

Closed

  • Add ControllerNameAttribute #47112
  • Identity: Adding user to role gives an Invalid Username error (UserManager.cs). #46860
  • Heartbeat.TimerLoop is consuming 5% of CPU usage in Thread.Sleep #47014
  • [usability] Update backport action to use final commit #33130
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Using event callbacks in backing classes #47098
  • [Blazor] Action result for rendering a component #46990
    8.0-preview3
  • InputSelect with empty option doesn't validate int #47088
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using both [Http*] and [Route] attributes #46936
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unable to locate repository with working directory that contains directory ... #44629
    Infrastructure
  • Increase timeout for project template tests to an hour #46782
    8.0-preview2
  • Support use of client certificate in SignalR cpp client. #46482
  • asp-route-{value} attributes do not work in anchor tags linking to Index pages #46748
  • .net 7 signalr Default authenticationSchemes not working #46774
  • Automatic setting of required attribute on primitive types #46805
  • Error in WebAPI model validation with records #46831
  • publish Microsoft.AspNetCore.App as nuget again? Issues in dontet interactive and fsharp scripts #46891

PullRequests

Created

  • Razor Component endpoint implementation #47117
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Log unsupported parameter binding scenarios for RDG #47118
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview3
  • Initial implementation of filtered full composite image #47085
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix Linux-Musl Composite Artifacts not being built #47104
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.5
  • Razor Component IResult #47023
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix ambiguous route detection for [Route] with HTTP methods #47106
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Set InvariantGlobalization in api template #47066
    area-mvc
  • Follow up on IParsable changes and update tests #47102
    area-runtime
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
  • Backport SignalR test changes #46648
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix canceling flush of CancelInvocation when canceling server-to-client stream #47099
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ProblemHttpResult #47100
    area-runtime, community-contribution
